newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico's oldest woman dies aged 118.
newsitem.headline: Mexico's oldest woman dies aged 118.

text.p: Mexico's oldest woman has died at the age of 118 in the southern state of Chiapas, the Televisa television network reported on Thursday.
Televisa said Francisca Cervantes, born in 1879, had lived through a volcanic eruption in 1902 and the turbulent 1910-17 Mexican Revolution.
"Dona Pachita", as Cervantes was affectionately known, had 16 children, hundreds of grandchildren and great-grandchildren.
She died on Wednesday and was to be buried later Thursday in Chiapas. She lived in the town of Metapa de Dominguez, 510 miles (820 km) southeast of Mexico City.
